title.narrative: Railway Energy Efficiency and Safety Enhancement Investment Program - Tranche 3

description.narrative: Tranche 3 of Investment Program will finance (i) procurement of energy efficient, environmental protection, and safety equipment that will result in energy savings, environmental protection, and enhanced safety. Physical components of Tranche 3 are (i) energy efficiency component: (a) railway electrification equipment, and (b) electric power supply system; (ii) environmental protection component: (a) noise barrier; and (iii) railway safety enhancement component: (a) enhanced railway fasteners and switches, (b) railway telecommunications system, (c) railway signaling system, (d) advanced railway inspection equipment, and (e) emergency rescue equipment, and any other equipment as agreed between PRC and ADB. This equipment has significant energy efficiency, environmental, and safety benefits compared to what is used currently on the PRC railways. Integrating this equipment into the southwestern PRC railway network will help optimize performance, ensure reliability, and enhance safety.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is develoed in the region.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is develoed in the region.

title.narrative: CO2 emissions in 2016 reduced by 22,000 tons

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is develoed in the region.

title.narrative: Fuel savings of CNY936 million in 2016

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is develoed in the region.

title.narrative: Railway transport throughput expanded in the southwestern PRC to 470 billion ton-km for freight in 2016

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is develoed in the region.

title.narrative: Cost of travel reduced from 35 fen/km in 2008 to 15 fen/km in 2016

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is develoed in the region.

title.narrative: Railway transport throughput expanded in the southwestern PRC to 140 billion passenger-km for passengers in 2016
